scaledmarkets.dabl.exec

Class RemoteRepo

  • java.lang.Object
    • scaledmarkets.dabl.exec.RemoteRepo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Repo

    public abstract class RemoteRepo
extends java.lang.Object
implements Repo
    A remote container for a set of files. By 'remote', we mean that the repo is accessed via a URL.

      • listFiles

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> listFiles(java.lang.String dirpath)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: Repo
        List the files that exist in the specified directory in this Repo. The directory may be a path of directories. The file path separator is a forward slash, and the root ("/") is the top of the Repo. The file names returned are relative to dirpath.
        Specified by:
        listFiles in interface Repo
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                                 java.lang.String dirpath)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: Repo
        List the files that exist in the specified directory and all child directories in this repo. The file paths (relative to dirpath) are returned in the list argument.
        Specified by:
